chapter.title: Authentication Server
chapter.para: The Authentication Server is based on LDAP and optionally Kerberos. You can configure it with a &yast; wizard.

To set up an authentication server for user account data, make sure the yast2-auth-server, openldap2, krb5-server, and krb5-client packages are installed; &yast; will remind you and install them if one of these packages is missing. Then proceed as follows:
